Quickstrike:




Quickstrike took Rattrap from Cyber Claw, holding him up by the neck 
in the jaws of his cobra hand. The fangs were less than a few inches 
from peicing his neck. He had a urge to kill him there and now, but 
he wanted revenge to be fun.

He walked in the base, with the female raptor reluctantly following. 
He went to the CR room, throwing Rattrap into a chamber. 

"Ah'll deal wit' ya later," he said low, and closed it. He walked 
back out, leading the way through the corridors, to Black Arachnia's 
location.

"Who is your leader again?" the female raptor asked.

"Black Arachnia," he replied. "Ah'm 'er second in commmand." He 
faintly heard her say something, but couldn't make it out. He turned 
one more corridor and called out, "Hey sugar-bot, ya oughta hear 
this. That bot out there wasn't Dinobot--"

The giant female behind him snarled ferociously, just enough to sound 
like she was going to attack him. He spun around.
